languages.text: "Как по мне — центрировать все каналы связи в руках одного офицера может быть чревато. Я слышала истории о Мастерах вокса, которые начинали самолично решать, что сообщать капитану корабля, а что — скрыть. Вигдис не проявляла подобных наклонностей. Пока что".

"If you ask me, leaving all the communication channels in the hands of a single officer can be dangerous. I have heard stories of Vox Masters who started to make their own decisions about what to tell the ship's captain and what to hide. To his credit, Vigdis has shown no such inclinations... At least, not yet."
languages.original_text: "Как по мне — центрировать все каналы связи в руках одного офицера может быть чревато. Я слышала истории о Мастерах вокса, которые начинали самолично решать, что сообщать капитану корабля, а что — скрыть. Вигдис не проявляла подобных наклонностей. Пока что".

traits.locale_text: "If you ask me, having all communication channels in the hands of a single officer can be dangerous. I have heard stories of Vox Masters who started to make their own decisions about what to tell the ship's captain and what to hide. Vigdis has shown no such inclinations... At least, not yet."

"If you ask me, having all communication channels in the hands of a single officer can be dangerous. I have heard stories of Vox Masters who started to make their own decisions about what to tell the ship's captain and what to hide. Vigdis has shown no such inclinations... At least, not yet."

"If you ask me, leaving all the communication channels in the hands of a single officer can be dangerous. I have heard stories of Vox Masters who started to make their own decisions about what to tell the ship's captain and what to hide. To his credit, Vigdis has shown no such inclinations... At least, not yet."

"If you ask me, leaving all the communication channels in the hands of a single officer can be dangerous. I have heard stories of Vox Masters who started to make their own decisions about what to tell the ship's captain and what to hide. To his credit, Vigdis has shown no such inclinations... At least, not yet."

"If you ask me, leaving all the communication channels in the hands of a single officer can be dangerous. I have heard stories of Vox Masters who started to make their own decisions about what to tell the ship's captain and what to hide. To his credit, Vigdis has shown no such inclinations... At least, not yet."

languages.text: « À mon humble avis, laisser un seul officier en charge de tous les canaux de communication n'est pas sans danger. J'ai déjà entendu des histoires de maîtres-vox qui s'étaient arrogé le droit de décider quelles informations transmettre au capitaine de son vaisseau, et quels renseignements lui cacher. Il faut reconnaître néanmoins que Vigdis n'a pas montré de telles tendances... Du moins, pas encore. »
languages.original_text: "If you ask me, leaving all the communication channels in the hands of a single officer can be dangerous. I have heard stories of Vox Masters who started to make their own decisions about what to tell the ship's captain and what to hide. To his credit, Vigdis has shown no such inclinations... At least, not yet."

traits.locale_text: « À mon humble avis, laisser un seul officier en charge de tous les canaux de communication n'est pas sans danger. J'ai déjà entendu des histoires de maîtres-vox qui s'étaient arrogé le droit de décider quelles informations transmettre au capitaine de son vaisseau, et quels renseignements lui cacher. Il faut reconnaître néanmoins que Vigdis n'a pas montré de telles tendances... Du moins, pas encore. »

languages.text: «En mi opinión, dejar todos los canales de comunicación en manos de una sola oficial puede ser peligroso. He oído historias sobre maestros de vocos que comenzaban a tomar sus propias decisiones sobre qué comunicar al capitán y qué reservarse. En favor de Vigdis, diré que no ha mostrado esa inclinación... por ahora».
languages.original_text: "If you ask me, leaving all the communication channels in the hands of a single officer can be dangerous. I have heard stories of Vox Masters who started to make their own decisions about what to tell the ship's captain and what to hide. To his credit, Vigdis has shown no such inclinations... At least, not yet."

traits.locale_text: «En mi opinión, dejar todos los canales de comunicación en manos de una sola oficial puede ser peligroso. He oído historias sobre maestros de vocos que comenzaban a tomar sus propias decisiones sobre qué comunicar al capitán y qué reservarse. En favor de Vigdis, diré que no ha mostrado esa inclinación... por ahora».

languages.text: “如果您要我说的话，我会认为，把所有的沟通渠道都交给同一名军官负责，是件相当危险的事情。我听说过很多故事，说音阵大师慢慢变得欺上瞒下，不再对领主舰长据实以告。不过，值得庆幸的是，维格迪斯并没有表现出这样的倾向……至少现在还没有。”
languages.original_text: "If you ask me, leaving all the communication channels in the hands of a single officer can be dangerous. I have heard stories of Vox Masters who started to make their own decisions about what to tell the ship's captain and what to hide. To his credit, Vigdis has shown no such inclinations... At least, not yet."

traits.locale_text: “如果您要我说的话，我会认为，把所有的沟通渠道都交给同一名军官负责，是件相当危险的事情。我听说过很多故事，说音阵大师慢慢变得欺上瞒下，不再对领主舰长据实以告。不过，值得庆幸的是，维格迪斯并没有表现出这样的倾向……至少现在还没有。”

languages.text: 「私に言わせれば、すべての連絡方法を一人のオフィサーの手に委ねるのは危険です。ヴォクス・マスターが中隊長に何を伝えるべきか、何を隠すべきか、自分で判断し始めたという話を聞いたことがあります。一応ヴィグディスの名誉のために言いますが、彼はそのような傾向は全くない…少なくとも、現時点では」
languages.original_text: "If you ask me, leaving all the communication channels in the hands of a single officer can be dangerous. I have heard stories of Vox Masters who started to make their own decisions about what to tell the ship's captain and what to hide. To his credit, Vigdis has shown no such inclinations... At least, not yet."

traits.locale_text: 「私に言わせれば、すべての連絡方法を一人のオフィサーの手に委ねるのは危険です。ヴォクス・マスターが中隊長に何を伝えるべきか、何を隠すべきか、自分で判断し始めたという話を聞いたことがあります。一応ヴィグディスの名誉のために言いますが、彼はそのような傾向は全くない…少なくとも、現時点では」

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr mich fragt, kann es gefährlich sein, sämtliche Kommunikationskanäle in die Hände eines einzigen Offiziers zu legen. Ich habe Geschichten von Voxmeistern gehört, die begonnen haben, selbst zu entscheiden, was sie dem Kapitän des Schiffs berichten und was sie verheimlichen. Man muss Vigdis aber zu Gute halten, dass er keine solchen Tendenzen gezeigt hat ... Zumindest noch nicht."
languages.original_text: "If you ask me, leaving all the communication channels in the hands of a single officer can be dangerous. I have heard stories of Vox Masters who started to make their own decisions about what to tell the ship's captain and what to hide. To his credit, Vigdis has shown no such inclinations... At least, not yet."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr mich fragt, kann es gefährlich sein, sämtliche Kommunikationskanäle in die Hände eines einzigen Offiziers zu legen. Ich habe Geschichten von Voxmeistern gehört, die begonnen haben, selbst zu entscheiden, was sie dem Kapitän des Schiffs berichten und was sie verheimlichen. Man muss Vigdis aber zu Gute halten, dass er keine solchen Tendenzen gezeigt hat ... Zumindest noch nicht."

string_traits.trait: Встраивание генокрадов и офицеров в мейнсюжет (Зауэрбэк + Инфернус)
